attributes.name: instanceId
attributes.description: Internal identifier of the job instance.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the job instance.

attributes.name: description
attributes.description: Job description.

attributes.name: state
attributes.description: Current state of the job.

attributes.name: stateChangeTime
attributes.description: Date and time of the last state change for the job.

attributes.name: submitTime
attributes.description: Date and time when the job was submitted.

attributes.name: startTime
attributes.description: Date and time when the job started.

attributes.name: endTime
attributes.description: Date and time when the job ended.

attributes.name: elapsedTime
attributes.description: Amount of time for which the job has been running.

attributes.name: estRemainTime
attributes.description: Estimated time remaining until the job completes.

attributes.name: progressPct
attributes.description: Approximate percentage of the job that has completed.

attributes.name: tasks
attributes.description: Set of tasks within the job, as defined by the jobTask object.

attributes.name: owner
attributes.description: Owning provider of the job.

attributes.name: requestId
attributes.description: Request ID for the job, provided by the client in the ?requestId request parameter. If the client attaches unique requestId values to an asynchronous request and the connection gets lost, the client can determine the status of the original request by making a GET job collection request filtered by the specific requestID value. (Store batchJobID for now)

attributes.name: methodName
attributes.description: Name of the method that the job is calling.

attributes.name: parametersOut
attributes.description: Output parameters and their values of what the job is calling.

attributes.name: statusCodeOut
attributes.description: Job execution result

attributes.name: messageOut
attributes.description: Status messages for job

attributes.name: isJobCancelable
attributes.description: Is job cancelable

attributes.name: isJobCancelled
attributes.description: Is job cancelled

attributes.name: clientData
attributes.description: User-specified data for the job, provided by the client in the clientData request parameter.
